mapper.select: select l.banner_img,l.lname,l.lintro,l.teacher_name, substr(l.address,instr(address,' ')+1,instr(address,'구',7,1)-instr(address,' ')-1) address, l.max_member,((l.end_time-l.start_time)/60) class_time,mod(l.end_time-l.start_time,60) class_time2,t.img from lesson l ,teacher t where t.teacher_name=l.teacher_name and lcode = #{lcode}
select c.career from career c where c.teacher_name= (select t.TEACHER_NAME from lesson l inner join teacher t on t.teacher_name=l.TEACHER_NAME where lcode= #{lcode})
select opt from opt
select count(*) cnt from review
select count(*) cnt from lesson_qna
select max_member, count(client_id) now_member from lesson l inner join students s on l.lcode=s.lcode where l.lcode=#{lcode} and s.status='Y' group by max_member
select count(client_id) from LESSON_LIKE where lcode=#{lcode}

select l.due_date, substr(address,1,instr(address,' ')-1) si, substr(l.address,instr(address,' ')+1,instr(address,'구',7,1)-instr(address,' ')-1) gu,t.introduce from lesson l inner join teacher t on t.teacher_name=l.teacher_name where lcode=#{lcode}
insert into students(client_id,lcode,status,join_date) values(#{clientId}, #{lcode},'Y',sysdate)
